name: Outlets at Legends
description: The Outlets at Legends is a premier open-air shopping destination in Sparks featuring over 60 brand-name outlet stores, restaurants, and entertainment options. The center includes popular retailers like Nike, Under Armour, Coach, and Columbia alongside dining options and Nevada's tax-free shopping advantage. Adjacent to SCHEELS, it's a convenient one-stop shopping experience.
shortDescription: Open-air outlet shopping with 60+ stores, tax-free advantage, and dining options.

faqs.question: What stores are at the Outlets at Legends?
faqs.answer: The center features 60+ brand-name outlets including Nike, Under Armour, Coach, Columbia, and many more.

faqs.question: Is there tax-free shopping?
faqs.answer: Nevada has no state income tax and sales tax is lower than California, making this a great shopping destination.

faqs.question: Is it near SCHEELS?
faqs.answer: Yes, the Outlets at Legends and SCHEELS share the Legends shopping complex in Sparks.

meta.title: Outlets at Legends Sparks – Tax-Free Shopping | Golf The High Sierra
meta.description: Shop 60+ brand-name outlets at the Legends in Sparks. Tax-free advantage and adjacent to SCHEELS. Perfect for golf trip shopping.

testimonials.quote: Outlets at Legends was a fun surprise on our trip. Perfect for the non-golfers and honestly the golfers enjoyed it too. Reno / Sparks has so much more than just great courses.
testimonials.author: Brandon N.

testimonials.quote: Visited Outlets at Legends during our golf trip and it was a great addition to the itinerary. Nice change of pace from the courses. GTHS really knows how to round out a trip with the right activities.
